subcategories.name: Promptness
subcategories.statement: The servers are swift in catering your needs.

subcategories.name: Attentiveness
subcategories.statement: The servers are attentive and responsive in serving your requests.

subcategories.name: Friendliness
subcategories.statement: The servers are friendly and accomodating toward you.

subcategories.name: Presentation
subcategories.statement: The meals look appetizing and appealing.

subcategories.name: Serving Size
subcategories.statement: The servers are generous and appropriate to its price.

subcategories.name: Atmosphere
subcategories.statement: The restaurant provides an inviting atmosphere.

subcategories.name: cleanliness
subcategories.statement: The restaurant looks tidy and spotless.

subcategories.name: comfort
subcategories.statement: I feel safe and comfortable inside the restaurant.
